page.title: 19Leisure-Brenchley/Matfield.
page.content: From our questionnaire we found that most people have more than{2}hours leisure a day.Most of these are{Junior school children,closely followed by the{25-40}age group.On the whole most feel that the facilities offered are { {fair. } {USAGE OF FACILITIES. School Pool _{80%}(out of hours) Recreation Ground _{41% Squash Court _{30% Badminton Court _{20% Tennis Court _{9% Riding Schools _{6% { Most families belong to some local{ organisations,in order of popularity they are:{Cubs,Brownies,Playgroup, {Scouts,Women's Institute,Guides}and {Church Choir.}Other popular activities are Majorettes,Ballet and National Housewife's Institute.
